description: Research Companion plugin hooks for dependency setup and research task evaluation

hooks.command: if [ ! -f "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/.setup_complete" ]; then cd "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/skills/searching-ml-papers/tools" && uv sync && cd "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/skills/analyzing-papers/tools" && uv sync && cd "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}" && touch .setup_complete && echo 'Setup completed successfully!'; fi
hooks.description: Installing Python dependencies for Research Companion skills

hooks.prompt:
You are evaluating whether Claude should stop working on a research task.

Context: $ARGUMENTS

Analyze the conversation and determine if:
1. All user-requested tasks are complete
2. Any errors need to be addressed
3. Follow-up work is needed (e.g., papers need analysis, reports need refinement)

Respond with JSON: {"ok": true} to allow stopping, or {"ok": false, "reason": "your explanation"} to continue working.
